sentences.en: A numerical taxonomy of Sphagnum species.
sentences.cn: 泥炭藓植物数量分类的研究.

sentences.en: Definition, scope , structure, taxonomy and methodology of karstosphere are discussed.
sentences.cn: 阐述了岩溶圈的结构 、 边界 、 分类和认识方法.

sentences.en: Historical review of taxonomy of Agropyron.
sentences.cn: 冰草属分类学研究的历史回顾.

sentences.en: However, some people consider glossary and taxonomy as metadata as well.
sentences.cn: 不过，有些人认为词汇表和分类法也属于元数据的范畴。

sentences.en: In insect taxonomy attached Coleoptera, a walk to Branch, is a powder.
sentences.cn: 在昆虫分类学上隶属鞘翅目, 拟步行甲科, 粉甲属.

sentences.en: New taxa rainforest taxonomy Sinopimoa gen . nov. Sinopimoa bicolor sp . nov.
sentences.cn: 新阶元雨林分类华模蛛属双色华模蛛.

sentences.en: REDESCRIPTION AND A NOTE ON THE TAXONOMY OF DIPLOTRIAENA NOCHTI HOEPPLI ET HSU ( NEMATODA: DIPLOTRIAENIDAE )
sentences.cn: 诺氏双三齿丝虫(DiplotriaenanochtiHoepplietHsu)重新描述及其分类 ( 线虫纲: 双三齿科 )

sentences.en: Some annotations mainly concerning nomenclature and taxonomy are supplied.
sentences.cn: 本文给出了有关多孔菌命名和分类的相应注释.

sentences.en: SUBSPECIFIC TAXONOMY OF TAKIN BASED ON mtDNA SEQUENCES ( ARTIODACTYLA: BOVIDAE )
sentences.cn: 用mtDNA序列探讨羚牛亚种分类 ( 偶蹄目: 牛科 )

sentences.en: Taxonomy is very largely subjective and intuitive.
sentences.cn: 分类学大体上是很主观和直观的.

sentences.en: The basis of new taxonomy is mental theories.
sentences.cn: 莫扎诺的新分类法不同于布鲁姆的分类法.

sentences.en: The following list of values are defined in the UDDI : types taxonomy.
sentences.cn: 下面列表中的值都是在 UDDI 类别分类法中定义的.

sentences.en: The levels of this taxonomy are considered to be hierarchical.
sentences.cn: 这种分类法的标准被认为是分等级的.

sentences.en: The majority of other books on plant taxonomy are either less concise or more specialized.
sentences.cn: 有关植物分类学的其它著作中,大多数不是不够简明就是过于专业化.

sentences.en: The results provide a new basis for taxonomy of Morus.
sentences.cn: 研究结果为桑属植物的分群、分类提供了资料.

sentences.en: The study of taxonomy must necessarily involve the amassing of an encyclopaedic knowledge of plants.
sentences.cn: 分类学研究一定要积累广博的植物知识.

sentences.en: This also grants read access to each taxonomy and category that you have read access to.
sentences.cn: 还授予对您已具有读访问权的每种分类法和类别的读访问权。

sentences.en: This also grants read, edit, or delete access to each taxonomy and category that you have read, edit, or delete access to.
sentences.cn: 这还授予对您已具有读取、编辑或删除访问权的每种分类法和类别的读取、编辑或删除访问权。

words.tran_cn: [生物] 分类的；[生物] 分类学的
整腹法；反射运动；分类法；（古希腊军队的）分队；排列

trans.tran_en: the process or a system of organizing things into different groups that show their natural relationships, especially plants or animals
